head.title: World Briefing | Europe: Germany: Opposition Lashes Out At Schröder

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Europe: Germany: Opposition Lashes Out At Schröder

block.p: The leader of the opposition Christian Democrats, Angela Merkel, accused Chancellor Gerhard Schröder of duping voters on everything from taxes to pension reform to foreign policy in order to win re-election in September. ''Schröder and his government lied without even batting an eyelash,'' she told delegates at a party congress in Hanover. She said the party would fight the chancellor's plans to restructure the labor market.
